problem_statement: The SaaS-Growth marketing site includes an interactive Pricing Calculator component that dynamically computes pricing based on seat count and billing period. The component currently lacks automated end-to-end coverage, resulting in regressions such as incorrect totals, NaN values when toggling annual billing on certain browsers, and missed tier transitions when crossing the Pro â†’ Enterprise threshold. The task is to design and implement a comprehensive E2E test suite to validate pricing logic, accessibility compliance, visual correctness, and responsive behavior across multiple viewports, ensuring long-term stability and regression prevention.
